title: Analyze Customer Feedback from Surveys
description: An analyst needs to analyze open-ended responses from a recent customer satisfaction survey to identify common themes.

tasks.description: Export the survey responses, focusing on the open-ended feedback question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a list of all the text responses.

tasks.description: Use natural language processing (NLP) to perform sentiment analysis and topic modeling on the responses.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool categorizes responses as positive/negative/neutral and identifies key topics like 'price', 'customer service', and 'shipping speed'.

tasks.description: Summarize the findings in a report, highlighting the most common points of praise and complaint.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report that clearly summarizes the qualitative feedback.
